casebody.data:
IN RE B.M. S242153 Supreme Court of California July 26, 2017 Votes: Cantil-Sakauye, C.J., Werdegar, J., Chin, Corrigan, Liu and Cuéllar, JJ.

The petition for review is granted. The issue to be briefed and argued is limited to the following: Can a butter knife with a rounded end and a serrated edge qualify as a deadly or dangerous weapon under Penal Code section 245, subdivision (a)(1) ?

Kruger, J., was absent and did not participate.
